--- format: html: theme: light: flatly css: styles.css page-layout: full toc: false --- ::: page-header # Travel & Accommodation ::: ## How to Reach IIT(ISM) Dhanbad ::::::::: {.grid .text-center .travel-section} :::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4 .travel-card} ::: icon-box ::: ### By Rail **Dhanbad Jn.** (2.8 km away) is the largest station in the state with direct trains to almost every major city. Taxis, Autos, and Ola cabs are available 24/7. :::: :::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4 .travel-card} ::: icon-box ::: ### By Road Connected via **NH-18 & NH-19**. Seamless bus connectivity to Ranchi, Kolkata, Jamshedpur, and Bokaro. :::: :::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4 .travel-card} ::: icon-box ::: ### By Air Nearest Airports: \* **Durgapur (RDP):** 85 km \* **Deoghar (DGH):** 110 km \* **Ranchi (IXR):** 140 km \* **Kolkata (CCU):** 269 km :::: ::::::::: ::: {.map-container .mt-5 .mb-5} ::: ## Accommodation ::: {.callout-note .hostel-note appearance="simple" icon="false"} ### üè® Institute Accommodation Participants will be provided **single/double occupancy accommodation** in IIT(ISM) Hostels and Guest House at nominal charges. A Google Form for booking will be shared shortly. ::: ### Nearby Hotels ::::::::::::::::::::: grid ::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-4} :::: hotel-card ::: hotel-info ```{html}

``` ::: :::: ::::: ::::::::::::::::::::: ## Places to See Nearby ::::::::::::::::::::: grid ::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} :::: tour-card ::: tour-header Deoghar & Baidyanath Dham :::

Distance: 120 km (3 hrs)

Home to the revered Baba Baidyanath Jyotirlinga. Visit Trikut Pahar for panoramic views and the intricate Naulakha Temple.

:::: ::::: ::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} :::: tour-card ::: tour-header Maithon Lake :::

Distance: 48 km (1 hr)

A serene reservoir on the Barakar River. Perfect for boating, fishing, and visiting the ancient Kalyaneshwari Temple and Deer Park.

:::: ::::: ::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} :::: tour-card ::: tour-header Parasnath Hills :::

Distance: 50 km (45 mins)

Jharkhand's highest peak (1,350m). A significant Jain pilgrimage site (Shikharji) adorned with ancient temples.

:::: ::::: ::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} :::: tour-card ::: tour-header Bodh Gaya :::

Distance: 208 km (3 hrs)

UNESCO World Heritage Site where Lord Buddha attained enlightenment. Features the Mahabodhi Temple and the Bodhi Tree.

:::: ::::: ::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} :::: tour-card ::: tour-header Ajodhya Hills (Purulia) :::

Distance: 101 km (3 hrs)

A picturesque retreat with waterfalls like Bamni Falls, lush forests, and dams. Ideal for nature lovers.

:::: ::::: ::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} :::: tour-card ::: tour-header Ranchi City :::

Distance: 150 km (4 hrs)

The city of waterfalls. Famous for Dassam Falls, Ranchi Lake, and the historic Jagannath Temple.

:::: ::::: :::::::::::::::::::::
